record.title: DISCHARGE AND REFERRAL

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that S. Res. 32 be discharged from the Rules Committee and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: I thank the Chair. I yield the floor and note the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
